TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Ogre Mage. You must try again!
You have defeated the Ogre Mage. The remaining Ogres will soon descend into chaos.
Khrona is pleased and pays you for your troubles.
You must first go to the Gluk and battle an Ogre Mage.
You must now head back to Dhun-Kor.
This Ogre Mage is very powerful and also knows the Rain of Fire spell.
